channel.title: Made a WebClient but cant log in! wtf? help
channel.description:
[center][b]Hey guys i made a webclient signed - client.jar - html - uploaded client.jar signed - public - add it into the html code
<center> <applet name="DeathlyScape" width="765" height="503" archive="https://www.dropbox.com/s/r8u7bn0n6w4p6wd/Syndicate.jar" code="client"> <param name="java_arguments" value="-Xmx1024m"/> </applet></center>
Added this into my website & Loaded up all fine but cant log in!!! cant connect???? i removed the .class from the client.class and left client but still cant log in!
Anyone know how i can fix this problem? thanks[/b][/center]

item.source: Made a WebClient but cant log in! wtf? help

item.title: Made a WebClient but cant log in! wtf? help
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

it has nothing to do with the web page markup, please stop posting it.
I never said anything about the server being on or offline(I’m sure you can debug that yourself.)

a client (in any situation) connects to a server of some sort. the server binds itself to a specified port, and listens for all incoming connections of the proper protocol (tcp/udp/etc)
the client itself will try to connect to a specified IP address, of the desired server. if given the right port, and follows all other guidelines, a connection will be made.

if you’re hosting the server on the same system (computer, vps, etc) as the connection is being made (same where the client is) then you must connect to a local address (localhost, 127.0.0.1, 0.0.0.0, etc)
if you are hosting the server on the same network, but a different system (on a separate computer in your household or network area) then you must connect through an IPv4 address. (you can get this via the command ipconfig in command prompt)
if you’re connecting to the server from an outside network (other players connecting to you) they will need your full IP address or dynamic ip from something like no-ip or dyndns.

Read full topic
item.source: Made a WebClient but cant log in! wtf? help

item.title: Made a WebClient but cant log in! wtf? help
item.dc:creator: @haviland4 haviland4
item.description:
@haviland4 wrote:

[b][center][quote=“Vain_, post:4, topic:528545”]the IP address? you may be connecting to the wrong one? not really sure how to further explain that.[/quote]

the server is 100% online because the client.jar download works fine and players are joining
but i created this webclient and now i cant seem to log in…

how do i add a ip address to the webclient? im lost.

;D ;D ;D ;D ;D

uploaded the signed jarmaker to dropbox added it to the html code and added my deathlyscape name. so i need to do more??

Thanks Josh[/center][/b]
